item.title: About
item.description: Software Engineer Tech: Node.js, Go, Python, Scala, Java, C++, JavaScript, REST, SQL, SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle DB, AWS, Azure, J2EE, Express.js, Git. I develop various backend services and APIs. Inherently curious. You can reach me at dharmikp572@gmail.com Github: https://github.com/DharmikP-CS LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dharmik-panchal/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Dharmik_cs HackerRank: https://www.hackerrank.com/dharmikp572 LeetCode: https://leetcode.com/DharmikP/ Curiosity may have killed the cat but it also fuelled the desire to explore the world. Our world is not limited due to our reach but due to our vision.

item.title: Projects
item.description: KeyV Go, Heroku May 2021 - Present KeyV(“Kiwi”) is a key value store written in Go. https://github.com/DharmikP-CS/KeyV Conway’s Game of Life React, JavaScript, GitHub pages Sept 2020 Implemented a responsive version of Conway’s Game of Life a cellular automaton using React and with various options to load, save patterns, generate random patterns, etc. See https://dharmikp-cs.github.io/gameoflife/ alGorithms/ Project-Euler Go Feb 2020-present Go implementation of some algorithms and solutions to some of Project Euler’s problems.
